title: 08/08/21: Search for an employee by badge number
content: Emprez now gives you the ability to search for an employee record by their badge number (the number they use to punch in).To do : From the Employees menu, click on Search,Type ! followed by the badge number (ex: !34587),Click on Search.To see other search methods, visit the Search for an employee file article.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
